entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:17 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 12:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers or drizzle beginning in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy mixed with drizzle changing to snow before morning. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High zero. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
